title: Chocolate mousse and chantilly cream bûche de Noël
ingredients: ['For the chocolate sponge', '3 eggs, separated', '1 pinch salt', '90g icing sugar', '90g plain flour, sifted', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', 'For the chantilly cream', '220ml chilled whipping cream', '2 to 3 teaspoons icing sugar', 'For the chocolate mousse', '150g dark chocolate', '3 eggs, separated', 'To decorate', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', 'white chocolate chips or grated chocolate']
